text: Bo on The Go is a 2007-09 Canadian CGI children's animated educational television series. It is aimed at preschool children. It was produced by Haflaxfilm. It was distributed by Decode Entertainment and produced with CBC Television (Season 1) and Kids CBC (Season 2-3). Category:Canadian animated television series Category:Canadian children's television series Category:2007 Canadian television series debuts
title: Bo on the Go!
